This film is an indie-horror that everyone who's watched it absolutely loves. It's such a different concept of a horror film exploring race and how little society has changed in heir perceptions. The performance of the main actor is insane and he was internationally recognised through various awards for his performance. I don't think I've ever seen an actor have a look of pure terror on his face, which he manages to pull off seemlessly. If you enjoy horror films, this one is a must see!

So so so satisfied with this movie. I did not even know about this movie until my friends dragged me to see it. So I have nothing on my mind when I watched thus. I think that was the best decision. This movie was an experience. They literally grabbed the audience and shook them up and down and side to side

Although this movie is labeled as horror, it is best described as a creepy suspense film. The actors and directors do an amazing job of bringing the story to life and making sure the audience stays interested throughout.

An over hyped film, but still good in its own right. The interesting plot and timely themes elevate the film to more than just a horror film. The main issue i have with the film, is that sometimes it tends to talk down to the audience, which i didnt appreciate. Also the comedic sidekick is just so malplaced and except for few narrative reasons, offers nothing. Still a pretty solid film overall.

말이 필요없는 최고의 한국 영화
‘싸늘하다..가슴에 비수가 날아와 꽃힌다, 하지만 걱정하지 마라, 손은 눈보다 빠르니깐’타짜라는 소재를 다룬 한국 영화중에 나중에도 회자될법한 영화.
장면 하나하나가 감동이다 ㅠㅠ주말에 미츠와 가서 라멘 먹어야겠다.

서로의 몸이 바뀌고 바뀐후에 기억이 없어진다는 것은 현실에서 있을 수 없는 일이었기에 더욱 몽환적인 것을 끌어내었다영화를 보고 가장 기억에 남는 것은 두가지였다첫째는 영화에서 펼처지는 그림들이었다그림은 물론 사진이어도 믿기 힘들 아름다운 그림들이 영화에 펼쳐져 있다 혜성을 표현하는 빛나는 선, 밤하늘에 빛나는 별들, 산에 있는 풀들과 나뭇잎 하나에도 모두 디테일이 빠지지 않았다둘째는 감정이입이었다주인공들이 만나서 하는 말은 모두 나에게 여화가 끝나도 잊을 수 없을정도로 큰 여운을 남겼고 마지막에 서로 재회하는 모습과 그림이지만 표정 또한 모든것이 완벽했다

你的名字

Your Name is easily one of my favorites movies and is one of the top grossing movies from Japan for a reason. This well-done animation goes through a destined love story so unique and breathtaking that will turn anyone into a romanticist. With its creative storyline and loveable characters, this groundbreaking film is a must see.

Beautiful graphic that captures the daily life so magically.This movie has taken a seemingly cliche story line and made it into a movie with a message to take with you.The music and the voice over was also well coordinated. However despite these points, the graphic and color is just so beautiful that it’s worth to just watch the movie for that

I can’t understand why there are so many bad comments on this movie. I know that the story is very Japanese and kinda cliche but the story was still very touching. I also liked the beautiful shades and backgrounds of the story. I really like all the series of this director.
